definition: something resembling a pool of liquid, eliminate urine
details:
noun
- something resembling a pool of liquid
= synonyms: pool
- a small body of standing water (rainwater) or other liquid
= example: a small body of standing water (rainwater) or other liquid
= synonyms: pool
- a mixture of wet clay and sand that can be used to line a pond and that is impervious to water when dry
verb
- eliminate urine
= synonyms: make
- mix up or confuse
= synonyms: muddle, addle
- make a puddle by splashing water
- make into a puddle
= example: make into a puddle
= synonyms: muddle
- mess around, as in a liquid or paste
- work a wet mixture, such as concrete or mud
- dip into mud before planting
= example: dip into mud before planting
- subject to puddling or form by puddling
= example: subject to puddling or form by puddling
- wade or dabble in a puddle
= example: wade or dabble in a puddle
